function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in bank branches due to lack of social distancing and contact reduction measures.","Impact":"Increase in the risk of customers and employees contracting contagious diseases, leading to potential illness, absenteeism, and reduced customer confidence.","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing protocols, minimize physical contact, and promote untact activities and procedures.","Technologies":"Digital technologies for untact activities, mobile banking, and online transaction services.","People":"Bank customers, bank employees, and individuals visiting bank branches.","Owner":"Bank management and regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Reduction in business volumes due to limited access to physical branches and preference for face-to-face banking.","Impact":"Loss of business, reduction in customer satisfaction, and potential impact on the sustainability of the bank's operations.","Mitigation":"Promote digital skills training for the older generation, provide enhanced online banking services, and develop alternative transaction options.","Technologies":"Online banking platforms, digital skills training programs, and alternative transaction technologies.","People":"Older generation customers, customers preferring face-to-face banking, and individuals with limited digital skills.","Owner":"Bank management and government agencies."}]}
